'''Death Proof''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to dodge one entire round of the Baleful Vajra's destructive waves during one battle with [[End of the Oneiric Euthymia|Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*The attack is only used in the boss' Baleful Shadowlord state. Three bolts are summoned and each one will periodically sent out a wave. These individual waves can be jumped over or dodged with i-frame dashes. At the end of this attack, each bolt will fire a wave simultaneously, which can be more difficult to avoid.
**Alternatively, players can either bring [[Albedo]], [[Zhongli]], [[Venti]] or [[Kaedehara Kazuha]] as their [[Elemental Skill]]s provide enough elevation to dodge the simultaneous waves at once. The latter two will require their Elemental Skill to be held.
